PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-12882013-11-28IC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPatent Act
SubjectRules Amending the Patent Rules
PrecisRules Amending the PATENT RULES in order to (1) simplify and clarify the processes of the Canadian Intellectual Property Office associated with the review of a patent application by the Commissioner of Patents that has been rejected in a Final Action by a patent examiner; and (2) make minor changes to clarify the Re-examination process.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0212 Publication Date: 2013-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Rules Amending the Patent Rules
precis: Rules Amending the PATENT RULES in order to (1) simplify and clarify the processes of the Canadian Intellectual Property Office associated with the review of a patent application by the Commissioner of Patents that has been rejected in a Final Action by a patent examiner; and (2) make minor changes to clarify the Re-examination process.
